name: BATTLE BOUND
description:
Install instructions

Not yet finished, final update coming June first(updating enemies, adding armor, jets, helicopters, and weaponized sports cars.

Beta edition, Like and Favorite!

This is a Human V A.I. game. You must team up to defeat them!

Arrow Keys/ W,A,S,D to move.

Mouse-Pointer to angle gun!Use X and Z to fire! Watch out for the tricky traps!
